<h1 align="center">
  <br>
  <a href="https://www.sphereon.com"><img src="https://sphereon.com/content/themes/sphereon/assets/img/logo.svg" alt="Sphereon" width="400"></a>
  <br>Issuance Branding (Typescript) 
  <br>
</h1>

---

**Warning: This package still is in very early development. Breaking changes without notice will happen at this point!**

---

A Sphereon SSI issuance branding plugin. This plugin manages issuer and credential branding and persists them. The branding can be used to display an issuer or a credential.

## Available functions

- ibAddCredentialBranding
- ibGetCredentialBranding
- ibUpdateCredentialBranding
- ibRemoveCredentialBranding
- ibAddCredentialLocaleBranding
- ibGetCredentialLocaleBranding
- ibRemoveCredentialLocaleBranding
- ibUpdateCredentialLocaleBranding
- ibCredentialLocaleBrandingFrom
- ibAddIssuerBranding
- ibGetIssuerBranding
- ibUpdateIssuerBranding
- ibRemoveIssuerBranding
- ibAddIssuerLocaleBranding
- ibGetIssuerLocaleBranding
- ibRemoveIssuerLocaleBranding
- ibUpdateIssuerLocaleBranding
- ibIssuerLocaleBrandingFrom

## Usage

**NOTE: Do note that when storing empty strings, that they are treated as no value**

### Adding the plugin to an agent:

```typescript
import { migrations, Entities } from '@veramo/data-store'
import { IssuanceBranding } from '@sphereon/ssi-sdk.issuance-branding'
import { IssuanceBrandingStore, DataStoreMigrations, DataStoreIssuanceBrandingEntities } from '@sphereon/ssi-sdk.data-store'

const dbConnection = createConnection({
  type: 'react-native',
  database: 'app.sqlite',
  location: 'default',
  logging: false,
  synchronize: false,
  migrationsRun: true,
  migrations: [...DataStoreMigrations, ...migrations],
  entities: [...DataStoreIssuanceBrandingEntities, ...Entities],
})

const agent = createAgent<IIssuanceBranding>({
  plugins: [
    new IssuanceBranding({
      store: new IssuanceBrandingStore(dbConnection),
    }),
  ],
})
```

### Add a credential branding:

```typescript
const credentialBranding: IBasicCredentialBranding = {
  issuerCorrelationId: 'd16084fb-4779-45c2-aee4-b0371cddae5a',
  vcHash: 'cefa7059-e0f6-4366-9302-96c2ee6b01f5',
  localeBranding: [
    {
      alias: 'credentialTypeAlias',
      locale: 'en-US',
      logo: {
        uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
        alt: 'Sphereon logo',
      },
      description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
      background: {
        color: '#7C1010',
        image: {
          uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
          alt: 'Sphereon background',
        },
      },
      text: {
        color: '#000000',
      },
    },
  ],
}

const result: ICredentialBranding = await agent.ibAddCredentialBranding(credentialBranding)
```

### Get credential branding:

```typescript
const result: Array<ICredentialBranding> = await agent.ibGetCredentialBranding({ filter: [{ vcHash: 'cefa7059-e0f6-4366-9302-96c2ee6b01f5' }] })
```

### Update a credential branding:

```typescript
const issuerCorrelationId = 'c1d968b9-fb94-4fd4-a8a5-dceaba3d542a'
const updatedCredentialBranding: ICredentialBranding = {
  ...credentialBranding,
  issuerCorrelationId,
}

const result: ICredentialBranding = await agent.ibUpdateCredentialBranding({ credentialBranding: updatedCredentialBranding })
```

### Remove a credential branding:

```typescript
const credentialBrandingId = 'a2ad95e3-6528-495d-b3a8-2bd4aa7b47b6'
await agent.ibRemoveCredentialBranding({ credentialBrandingId })
```

### Add a credential locale branding:

```typescript
const credentialLocaleBranding: IBasicCredentialLocaleBranding = {
  alias: 'credentialTypeAlias',
  locale: 'en-GB',
  logo: {
    uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
    alt: 'Sphereon logo',
  },
  description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
  background: {
    color: '#7C1010',
    image: {
      uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      alt: 'Sphereon background',
    },
  },
  text: {
    color: '#000000',
  },
}

const result: ICredentialBranding = await agent.ibAddCredentialLocaleBranding({
  credentialBrandingId: 'a2ad95e3-6528-495d-b3a8-2bd4aa7b47b6',
  localeBranding: [credentialLocaleBranding],
})
```

### Get credential locale branding:

```typescript
const result: Array<ICredentialLocaleBranding> = await agent.ibGetCredentialLocaleBranding({ filter: [{ locale: 'en-US' }] })
```

### Remove a credential locale branding:

```typescript
const credentialLocaleBrandingId = '00681f2f-9266-4775-9cf4-2f4d32f7296d'
await agent.ibRemoveCredentialLocaleBranding({ credentialLocaleBrandingId })
```

### Update a credential locale branding:

```typescript
const updatedCredentialLocaleBranding: ICredentialLocaleBranding = {
  ...credentialLocaleBranding,
  locale: 'en-GB',
}

const result: ICredentialLocaleBranding = await agent.ibUpdateCredentialLocaleBranding({ localeBranding: updatedCredentialLocaleBranding })
```

### credential locale branding from:

```typescript
const credentialLocaleBranding: IBasicCredentialLocaleBranding = {
  alias: 'credentialTypeAlias',
  locale: 'en-US',
  logo: {
    uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
    alt: 'Sphereon logo',
  },
  description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
  background: {
    color: '#7C1010',
    image: {
      uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      alt: 'Sphereon background',
    },
  },
  text: {
    color: '#000000',
  },
}

const result: IBasicCredentialLocaleBranding = await agent.ibCredentialLocaleBrandingFrom({
  localeBranding: credentialLocaleBranding,
})
```

### Add an issuer branding:

```typescript
const issuerBranding: IBasicIssuerBranding = {
  issuerCorrelationId: 'd16084fb-4779-45c2-aee4-b0371cddae5a',
  localeBranding: [
    {
      alias: 'issuerAlias',
      locale: 'en-US',
      logo: {
        uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
        alt: 'Sphereon logo',
      },
      description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
      background: {
        color: '#7C1010',
        image: {
          uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
          alt: 'Sphereon background',
        },
      },
      text: {
        color: '#000000',
      },
    },
  ],
}

const result: IIssuerBranding = await agent.ibAddIssuerBranding(issuerBranding)
```

### Get issuer branding:

```typescript
const result: Array<IIssuerBranding> = await agent.ibGetIssuerBranding({ filter: [{ issuerCorrelationId: 'd16084fb-4779-45c2-aee4-b0371cddae5a' }] })
```

### Update an issuer branding:

```typescript
const issuerCorrelationId = 'd9e84a03-98cd-4d6a-8562-ee66d19d17ce'
const updatedIssuerBranding: IIssuerBranding = {
  ...issuerBranding,
  issuerCorrelationId,
}

const result: IIssuerBranding = await agent.ibUpdateIssuerBranding({ issuerBranding: updatedIssuerBranding })
```

### Remove an issuer branding:

```typescript
const issuerBrandingId = '9206de75-ade6-4ad2-bf4e-f69d2e6a0688'
await agent.ibRemoveIssuerBranding({ issuerBrandingId })
```

### Add an issuer locale branding:

```typescript
const issuerLocaleBranding: IBasicIssuerLocaleBranding = {
  alias: 'issuerAlias',
  locale: 'en-GB',
  logo: {
    uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
    alt: 'Sphereon logo',
  },
  description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
  background: {
    color: '#7C1010',
    image: {
      uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      alt: 'Sphereon background',
    },
  },
  text: {
    color: '#000000',
  },
}
const result: IIssuerBranding = await agent.ibAddIssuerLocaleBranding({
  issuerBrandingId: '9206de75-ade6-4ad2-bf4e-f69d2e6a0688',
  localeBranding: [issuerLocaleBranding],
})
```

### Get issuer locale branding:

```typescript
const result: Array<IIssuerLocaleBranding> = await agent.ibGetIssuerLocaleBranding({ filter: [{ locale: 'en-US' }] })
```

### Remove an issuer locale branding:

```typescript
const issuerLocaleBrandingId = '9206de75-ade6-4ad2-bf4e-f69d2e6a0688'
await agent.ibRemoveIssuerLocaleBranding({ issuerLocaleBrandingId })
```

### Update an issuer locale branding:

```typescript
const updatedIssuerLocaleBranding: IIssuerLocaleBranding = {
  ...issuerLocaleBranding,
  locale: 'en-GB',
}

const result: IIssuerLocaleBranding = await agent.ibUpdateIssuerLocaleBranding({ localeBranding: updatedIssuerLocaleBranding })
```

### issuer locale branding from:

```typescript
const issuerLocaleBranding: IBasicIssuerLocaleBranding = {
  alias: 'issuerAlias',
  locale: 'en-GB',
  logo: {
    uri: 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH_Mh53yhI5xw/company-logo_200_200/0/1556030486007?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=GzkCQ7R9LiixkRJVob7_iKRoEgEUH1FE6O6oz6ZgVEc',
    alt: 'Sphereon logo',
  },
  description: 'Sphereon credential branding',
  background: {
    color: '#7C1010',
    image: {
      uri: 'data:image/png;base64,',
      alt: 'Sphereon background',
    },
  },
  text: {
    color: '#000000',
  },
}

const result: IBasicIssuerLocaleBranding = await agent.ibIssuerLocaleBrandingFrom({
  localeBranding: issuerLocaleBranding,
})
```

## Installation

```shell
yarn add @sphereon/ssi-sdk.issuance-branding
```

## Build

```shell
yarn build
```
